message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal, and I believe you'll find it to be a valuable asset. Let me know your thoughts!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit, but I can't go lower than $10,500.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let me know what you think.
